thread.title: 130 Ways to Save Money and Still Have the Wedding of Your Dreams
thread.title_full: 130 Ways to Save Money and Still Have the Wedding of Your Dreams

author: Tara Block
title: 130 Ways to Save Money and Still Have the Wedding of Your Dreams
text:
How to Save Money on a Wedding 130 Ways to Save Money and Still Have the Wedding of Your Dreams March 15, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 130 Ways to Save Money and Still Have the Wedding of Your Dreams 
Although many of us dreamed of our wedding when we were young, I'm betting that, as kids, we weren't able to process how much the big day costs. It's only after we've become adults and deal with grown-up stuff like school loans and 401(k) contributions that the true cost of a wedding really hits home. Going into debt because of a wedding isn't exactly the most romantic way to start a marriage, so read on for suggestions to help you save money on your wedding. Related:
